resources.string: Error happened when preparing first run
Password does not match! if you have swtiched to a exists store place which has different password, use %1s$
file corrupted, re-init all resource? your password will be lost
scan server and connect. if none avaible ,create a new server
create a new TalkNoMoney server ,wait for others join
scan TalkNoMoney server and connect it
Http Server : %1$s\nDNS Server state: %2$s\nOver WIFI network : %3$s
You must has an external SDCard to run this App
choose which used to determine IP of hotspot. most should choose one with ip 192.168.43.1 (Android default) . if this is not the case ,choose the correct one.
no server avaiable over current network, switch to another or scan again?
Password incorrect, try again ? if you forgot it totally , you can re-init app

string-array.name: array_root_notice
string-array.item: root permission is needed for works properly, you need a "rooted" phone, and should confirm "yes" in following dialog. without root permission, others must run client or input URL directly to access your server. but if you have root permission, any URL from any client will be directed to your server
waiting root permission grant… may be take a while. please say "yes" or "grant" when asking.
acquire root timeout or failed , try again ?
acquire root permission failed , maybe your phone is not rooted yet.

resources.string: I known , dont show it again
"Do you want to reset resources ? your previous talking record will be lost!"
"set a password to protect your app and records. it must be entered every time you enter app. press cancel to continue if you don't need password protection. "
please input password again to confirm
warning: your wifi will be disconnect when hostspot turned on
more than one interface found, maybe your device have extra wifi or ethernet. please select which interface(s) should server running on. if not sure, select all

wifi hotspot can not be started. you can try to start it manually at system settings->more settings->network share(some device may have separate "wifi share" app). continue without hotspot also works, but you must join wifi and others must enter the url displayed on this app to access your service
custom hotspot ssid, if not set or leave blank, will use random name (such as freewifi_9bx3s)
no avabile iptables command found, maybe you need to install busybox manually
could not found any net interface on your device !
